mapper.select: select distinct w.id, s.source_id, s.full_name source_name, s.town_code, s.town_name, cp.acquisition_brand, c.construction_unit, c.construction_status, w.warn_type, w.warn_level, l.dict_label warn_level_name, w.proc_state, p.dict_label proc_state_name, w.start_date, w.end_date, w.warn_desc from dat_warnmsgheads w left join dat_warnmsgdetails d on d.head_id = w.id and d.is_deleted = 0 left join bas_checkpoint_element ce on ce.cp_elem_id = d.cp_elem_id and ce.is_deleted = 0 left join bas_checkpoint cp on cp.collect_id = ce.collect_id and cp.is_deleted = 0 inner join basecenter.pf_bas_source s on s.source_id = w.source_id and s.is_deleted = 0 inner join basecenter.pf_bas_constructioninfo c on c.pf_source_id = s.source_id and c.is_deleted = 0 left join basecenter.sys_dict_data l on l.dict_value = w.warn_level and l.dict_type = 'ty_warn_level' left join basecenter.sys_dict_data p on p.dict_value = w.proc_state and p.dict_type = 'ty_proc_state' where w.is_deleted = 0 and c.tag_head_id = #{param.tagHeadId}
